name: LAG Out
description:
This is for the Training Arc #1 Game Jam Hosted by NuggFrog

Theme - "Connection Lost"

LAG Out is a top-down shooter where lag is your friend and you use your spacebar to activate it. once in lag mode all enemies freeze and shots freeze as well. But hold on to your hats once your lag bar drains completely your foes start moving again as well as your bullets!
